itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss conservatives leaving Twitter, Facebook, and YouTube to alternate social media apps like Parler and Rumble, whether or not they are worth it, the pros and cons of them, and if it benefits our society to have two separate echo chambers politically to communicate with one another.
